title: The impact of secondary operating temperature on in-line coagulation/flocculation and fouling of membranes used in tertiary treatment
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1676-1687
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00239C, Paper
Chen Tao, Wayne Parker, Pierre Bérubé
The preferred coagulant dosage and mechanisms of tertiary fouling mitigation with the effect of secondary operating temperature were comprehensively studied.
